name: ilovedotnet
description: configuration to build and purge css

scripts.buildcss:dev: npm run buildbulma && npx tailwindcss -i wwwroot/css/app.css -o wwwroot/css/app.min.css --watch
scripts.buildcss:prod: npm run buildbulma && npx tailwindcss -i wwwroot/css/app.css -o wwwroot/css/app.min.css --minify
scripts.buildcss: npm run buildcss:prod && npm run purgecss
